DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety tolerability VLTS-589 compare placebo , administer bilaterally low extremity , subject intermittent claudication determine effect VLTS-589 peak walking time ( PWT ) subject receive VLTS-589 compare subject receive placebo .
DOC.brief_title: Trial VLTS-589 Subjects With Intermittent Claudication
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Men woman 40 80 year age , Must give informed consent , Current medical history peripheral arterial disease , include follow symptom : leg pain , leg discomfort leg weakness Exclusion criterion : Ulcers gangrene , History cancer ( except skin cancer ) within past 5 year , Participation another clinical trial within 30 day enrollment trial , Unwillingness inability comply study requirement
